typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> GeneralJournalAccountEntryDs
GeneralJournalAccountEntryDs sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	fileSystem: 'synapse',
	compressionCodec: 'gzip',
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> GeneralJournalAccountEntrySql
